name: aliexpress_bulk_search
description: Search multiple products on AliExpress in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling aliexpress_search multiple times.

parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Comma-separated search queries (e.g. 'wireless earbuds,phone case,LED strip')

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const items = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="search-item-card"], [class*="product-card"], a[href*="/item/"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(items.length, 5); i++) { const el = items[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('h1, h3, [class*="title"]'); const priceEl = el.querySelector('[class*="price"]'); const ordersEl = el.querySelector('[class*="sold"]'); const linkEl = el.tagName === 'A' ? el : el.querySelector('a'); results.push({ title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 150) : '', price: priceEl ? priceEl.textContent.trim() : '', orders: ordersEl ? ordersEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '' }); } const pathMatch = window.location.pathname.match(/\/w\/wholesale-(.+)\.html/); const query = pathMatch ? decodeURIComponent(pathMatch[1].replace(/-/g, ' ')) : document.title || ''; return { query: query, result_count: results.length, results: results }
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
